name: Who is the HERO? -Lycoris-
storyline: Rico, who cannot fight, avoids the monster with the fairy's transparent magic and fulfills the three wishes requested by the fairy. "If three wishes can be fulfilled, my flower garden will be fine." This is a story of a small adventure that you will forget when you grow up.
summary: A three-day story about a girl named Rico who lives in a village and is a mysterious fairy.
